name: Santa Diesel
description:
On Christmas eve, you embody the Santa Claus in order to deliver gifts to children across the world but the sleigh broke down. 

He didn't give up and decided to keep his tour by parkour to prove that he could still be the guarantor of children happiness and still bypass Amazon deliveries.

Controls :
